org.jungrapht.visualization.util

Interface ChangeEventSupport

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    MultiLayerTransformer, MutableTransformer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicTransformer, DefaultChangeEventSupport, HyperbolicShapeTransformer, HyperbolicTransformer, LensTransformer, LensTransformSupport, MagnifyShapeTransformer, MagnifyTransformer, MutableAffineTransformer, MutableTransformerDecorator, TransformSupport

    public interface ChangeEventSupport
    the implementing class provides support for ChangeEvents.
    Author:
    Tom Nelson - tomnelson@dev.java.net

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      void fireStateChanged() 
      ChangeListener[] getChangeListeners()
      Returns an array of all the ChangeListeners added with addChangeListener().

      Removes a ChangeListener.

        Removes a ChangeListener.

        l - the listener to be removed

      • getChangeListeners

        ChangeListener[] getChangeListeners()
        Returns an array of all the ChangeListeners added with addChangeListener().
        Returns:
        all of the ChangeListeners added or an empty array if no listeners have been added
